about_the_game:
The Smile For Me Official Soundtrack is a treat for the ears, with 14 in-game tracks composed by Lucas Saur and recorded with live instruments.

The album also includes 7 bonus tracks not available in-game, including the 2022 Smile For Me trailer track by Louie Zong!

The soundtrack has over 45 minutes of tasty 320kbps music, perfect for audiophiles and Habiticians alike!
detailed_description:
FULLY REMASTERED!

The Smile For Me Official Soundtrack has been given a full remaster, courtesy of Stumpy Frog Records.
As of December 2022, the soundtrack is higher quality than ever before, with three brand-new bonus tracks to celebrate Smile For Me's Bloom Update.
